tool_description: Searches and identifies potential photography locations based on client requirements, style preferences, and logistical constraints.

search_radius_miles.description: Maximum distance from base location to search for venues

location_types.description: Types of locations to search for

indoor_outdoor.description: Location environment: indoor, outdoor, or both

base_city.description: City or area to center the search around

style_preference.description: Photography style to match: natural, dramatic, vintage, modern, candid, or formal

exclude_locations.description: Locations to exclude from search results

error_messages: Invalid search radius: Must be between 1 and 100 miles
Empty location types: Must specify at least one location type
Invalid indoor/outdoor preference: Must be 'indoor', 'outdoor', or 'both'
Invalid style preference: Must be one of [natural, dramatic, vintage, modern, candid, formal]
Invalid base city: City name cannot be empty or invalid
usage: Specify search parameters including radius, location types, and preferences. The tool will return a curated list of potential locations with basic details for further evaluation.

location_types_found.description: Types of locations found in search

search_summary.description: Summary of search results and recommendations
